attributes.action: Make the issue of Climate Change the first priority of his government and treat the matter with the seriousness that would be accorded to armed conflict with another state
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming rapidly more clear that the massive danger posed by  Climate Change has been repeatedly under-estimated.  Early action needs to be radical and the absolute priority of any government.  We urge the Prime Minister and indeed all politicians to set aside party political issues and treat the matter akin to the way a serious national emergency would be addressed.  There is a real danger that politics will get in the way of what clearly needs to be done to address the terrifying potential that daily unfolds of a future world bereft of diversity, beauty and in consequence, morality.
